# ReferenceComponent.LoadingPolicy

**Enumeration**

Describes when a referenced entity loads.

## Declaration

```swift
enum LoadingPolicy
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **ReferenceComponent.LoadingPolicy.immediate**: Loads the contents from the referenced entity file immediately when the root entity loads.
- **ReferenceComponent.LoadingPolicy.onDemand**: Loads the contents from the referenced entity file when your app tells it to.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
